Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey and red in section, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393766) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393766)
